Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Creusa led us to the Xeno facilities and helped us find the necessary evidence of what this Plague exactly is. It is time to take a closer look and see what we can find ourselves.
克瑞乌萨带我们来到异星疫病研究所，并帮助我们找到了鉴别这种疫病的必要证据。现在该进一步观察一下，看看我们还能找到些什么。
Creusa - An Amazon who was part of Berhane’s forces
Develop a serum to administer to the local infected wildlife.
研制一种血清来治疗当地受感染的野生动物。
You can win this map by stopping Berhane.[br/][br/]Berhane's Location Obtained: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
阻止勃海因即可获得这张地图的胜利。[br/][br/]获悉勃海因的位置信息：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
Berhane - Amazon character who was the old mentor of Mahina
已获悉勃海因的位置信息：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
将克瑞乌萨编入你的军队
You must learn more of this 'Xenoplague' in order to understand it and ultimately fight it.
你必须深入了解“异星疫病”才能认清它的本质并最终战胜它。
You have the last known location of Berhane. The sooner you track her down, the better.
你已经知道了勃海因的最新位置，尽快找到她。
If you want to find out where Berhane is, you will have to go through her puppet, Kiri Uz'Kol.
要想知道勃海因在哪儿，你就得先打败她的马前卒基里乌兹科尔。
As Amazon Matriarch, it is your duty to preserve and nurture the natural environment around you. Watch out for threats that could endanger the equilibrium you bring.
作为亚马逊族长，你的任务就是保护周围的自然环境，让它健康发展。要留意对你所创造的平衡有害的一切威胁。
We have finally arrived on Thanakiwa. It appears to be as lush and densely forested as the long range scans indicated. Our colony will certainly thrive in an environment like this.
我们终于抵达了瑟纳基瓦。据远程扫描仪显示，我们的目的地似乎非常的苍翠繁茂而且高度森林化。我们的殖民地在这样的环境下肯定能蓬勃发展。

Matron {STR_LeaderFirstName}, during the landing sequence we noticed plenty of wildlife on this planet. Many of them seem powerful, and could prove to be capable combatants. Perhaps we could tame them to bolster our numbers here?
{STR_LeaderFirstName}族长，在着陆的准备期间，我们注意到这个星球上有很多野生动物。它们当中有很多看起来都非常强健，应该可以成为我们的得力战士。也许我们应该驯服它们，壮大我们的数量？
{STR_LeaderFirstName} - Shows the name of the player

Hmm, good thinking, sister. We should scout the area for strong beasts to capture. But our priority mission comes first: tracking down Berhane. We must find her last known location and start the hunt from there.
嗯，好主意，姐妹。我们会侦察这个区域，寻找可以捕捉的强壮野兽。但是我们当前应当把重心放到首要任务上：找到勃海因。我们一定要找到她最后出没的位置，然后从那里开始追捕她。
Following standard Matriarch protocol you should start exploring Thanakiwa by hunting and taming some of the planet's wildlife.
根据族长的标准规范流程，你应该开始探索瑟纳基瓦，捕捉并驯服当地的一些野生动物。

No drill or training matches the thrill of a real hunt! Unfortunately, we could only take a few of the beasts into our care. Most of them had peculiar growths on their bodies, unlike anything we have seen before.
真实狩猎的刺激感是在任何训练和演习中都体会不到的！遗憾的是，我们只能驯养一小部分野兽。它们当中大多数身上都有着奇怪的增生物，这些东西我们以前从未见过。

Matron {STR_LeaderFirstName}! We have discovered a Xenolab facility not far from here. It seems to be central to the corruption afflicting the wildlife. We dared not enter alone, but we suspect that it may contain more answers.
{STR_LeaderFirstName}族长！我们在不远处发现了一个异星疫病实验室，那些受到感染的野生动物似乎就是从那里来的。我们不敢独自进入，但那里边也许会有更多答案。
Matron - a title given to the Amazon
Thank you for your candor, sister. That is troubling indeed, and something we will need to investigate immediately. Was there anything else?
感谢你的坦诚，姐妹。这确实很令人头疼，我们需要立刻调查这个地方。那里还有其他东西么？
Yes, Matron. We have found the tracks of a larger predator. Judging by the footprints, it must be enormous.
是的，族长。我们还发现了大型掠食者的踪迹。从它留下的脚印看，一定是个庞然大物。
Finally, a challenge! Send forth the Shrikes, muster the Lancers! We have big game to hunt!
终于，挑战来了！派出翼龙，召集长矛兵！我们这次要大干一场！

Shrikes - Amazon bird like unit
Lancers - Amazon units
Your huntresses have encountered another predator roaming Thanakiwa. Let the hunt continue to track the beast down!
你的女猎手遇到了另一个浪迹在瑟纳基瓦的掠食者。继续捕猎，找到那头野兽！
Rooaarr! (The beast, though sunken to the ground, continues to flex its muscles, angrily glaring in your direction.)
嗷！（这头野兽虽然摔倒在地，却仍然抽动着全身的肌肉，愤怒地瞪着你。）
Matron {STR_LeaderFirstName}, what are you waiting for? Put an end to this abomination!
{STR_LeaderFirstName}族长，你还在等什么？快了结了这个怪物！
No… I feel sympathy for the creature. It somehow reminds me of what could have become of us Amazons if we had tampered with our DNA any further, like Berhane does.
不…我同情这个家伙。它让我想到了如果我们像勃海因那样进一步改动自己的基因，我们亚马逊族人将会变成什么样。
Grrrr raaaarrrr! (The beast leaps in your direction, its jaws opened in deadly anticipation. But you swiftly evade its charge, striking it with a punishing blow.)
嗷嗷！（这野兽张着血盆大口朝你扑来，但你敏捷地躲过了它的冲刺，给了它重重一击。）
Ho! It is time you learn to obey your new master. Here, this Advanced Instinct Controller will keep your rage in check – and if it doesn’t, you will return to taste the fury of the Lancer!
呵！是时候臣服于你的新主人了。这个高级本能控制器将会抑制你的怒火 - 如果没有效果，那你就再次面对长矛兵的猛攻吧！
We must investigate why there is a parasite infesting some of the planet's wildlife.
我们必须调查清楚为什么这个星球上会有侵害野生动物的寄生虫。
For a planet rich with wildlife, it is eerily quiet here. This must be the facility the scouts found. Looks very much abandoned.
对于一颗物种丰富的星球来说，这里太过安静了。想必这就是侦察兵发现的设施地方，似乎已经彻底荒废了。
(Suddenly, a pack of hopperhounds pour out of the building complex, disturbed by your presence!)[br/][br/]On alert, sisters! Fall back, and reform with me!
（突然，一群跳蝗从设施建筑中蜂拥而出，显然你的出现惊扰了它们！）[br/][br/]提高警惕，姐妹们！后撤，到我这里来重组队形！
That was a close call. This plague has infected these hopperhounds too. We need access to this facility. Perhaps it is best if we put these poor beasts out of their misery.
有惊无险。这群跳蝗也被这种疫病感染了。我们需要进入这个地方。也许我们最好让这些可怜的家伙得到解脱。
Many creatures in this area have been taken over by the parasites. You cannot proceed until you've gotten rid of them. Kill the parasite-controlled wildlife.
这个区域的很多生物都被寄生物感染了。你必须解决它们才能继续前行。消灭那些被寄生的动物。
Huntresses, take their bodies back to the colony. Have the scientists investigate their parasitic infection.
猎手们，将这些动物的尸体带回殖民地。让科学家们调查它们的寄生情况。
Yes, Matron! We will deliver these specimens to our research facilities immediately.
遵命，族长！我们会立刻把这些标本送到研究所。
I cannot help but feel sympathy for these creatures. This plague appears to have caused them terrible suffering.
我不禁有些同情这些生物。这场疫病显然让它们承受了莫大的痛苦。
You must find a cure so that we can save as much of the planet's wildlife as possible. Your scientists should focus their efforts toward developing a cure to the infestation.
你一定要找到解药，这样我们才能尽可能多地拯救这个星球上的动物。你的科学家们会尽全力研制这种疫病的解药。

Matron {STR_LeaderFirstName}, our scientists have concluded their research into the plague and… unfortunately, there is no cure. Their only significant finding is that killing the host also kills the parasite. It lives in symbiosis with its host organism.
{STR_LeaderFirstName}族长，我们的科学家们已经完成了对疫病的研究…很不幸，她们没有发现任何解药。她们唯一的重大发现就是杀掉宿主也会同时杀掉寄生物。这些寄生物与宿主是共生关系。
Then there is nothing we can do to prevent this plague from spreading further. We must correct Berhane’s mistakes by stopping those responsible for introducing the plague to this world.
那么我们已经没有办法阻止这场疫病继续蔓延了。我们一定要阻止那些将疫病带到这个世界的人，纠正勃海因的过错。
You have the last known location of Berhane. The sooner you track her down, the better.
你已经知道了勃海因的最新位置，尽快找到她。

More test subjects for plague to eat? Berhane will be pleased! You whelps do not realize full extent of your predicament. Too late to turn back. Submit to the plague's consumption. Conclude this sorry tale quickly.
还有这么多疫病实验对象？勃海因会很高兴的！你们这群无知之人没有意识到自己面对的是怎样的险境。现在回头已经晚了。臣服于疫病的侵蚀吧，让这个可悲的故事早点结束。

A Kir’Ko? You are one of Berhane’s lackeys? We are here to stop her. Get out of our way! Her transgressions cannot be forgiven. She must be held accountable. If you impede us, we won’t hesitate to put you down like a sick hopperhound.
一个奇尔寇？你是勃海因的走狗？让开！我们是来阻止她的。她的罪过不可饶恕，她必须承担起责任。如果你要出手阻挠，我们会毫不犹豫的将你除掉，就像除掉一只被感染的跳蝗那样。

Berhane left to another planet long ago. She continues our research. You cannot stop the plague from spreading. We’ll crush you quickly! The infection craves new hosts. You’ll not escape this planet alive.
勃海因早就前往另一个星球了。她仍在继续我们的研究。你们无法阻止疫病蔓延。我们会很快将你们粉碎！感染源需要新的宿主。你们别想活着逃离这个星球。

What, she is the one behind this plague?! How could she do this? I knew she disagrees with some of our teachings, but this is insane! And she’s escaped already…[br/][br/]That will have to come later. I first need to deal with you, Kir’Ko, and the rest of your plague cult, before you contaminate the rest of this world!
什么，她是这场疫病的幕后主使？！她怎么可以这样做？我知道她不认同我们的某些教导，但这真是疯了！而且她已经逃走了…[br/][br/]这个稍后再处理。我要先除掉你，奇尔寇，还有你疫病邪教的余党们，阻止你们继续污染这个世界！
The Kir'Ko lackey Kiri Uz'Kol cannot be reasoned with. She is blinded by power, and if we want to find out more about Berhane, we will need to go through her.
那个奇尔寇手下基里乌兹科尔讲不通道理。她已经被力量蒙蔽了双眼，如果我们要想知道勃海因的下落，就必须先打败她。
This cannot be! We were supposed to be immortalized… she promised us…
不可能！我们应该是永生的…她承诺过的…

Seems that she lied to you, just as she betrayed her own people. But I will give you a chance to redeem yourself. Tell me where Berhane went, and I will spare your life. Decline, and we will be forced to resort to other measures to extract the information from you.
看来她欺骗了你们，就像她背叛她自己的同胞那样。不过我会给你一个将功补过的机会。告诉我勃海因去了哪里，我就饶你不死。如果你拒绝，那我们就得采取其他强制措施从你口中获得信息。

Not necessary, ha-ha! She means nothing to us, a path to power, nothing more. If anything, we were using her, ha-ha! (Now that she is on her knees, this coward shows her true colors.) She left for Avium SK-51! We swear it on ancestors!
没有必要，哈哈！她对我们来说没有任何意义，不过是获得力量的踏板而已。我们只是在利用她，哈哈！（她跪地求饶，暴露出她懦弱的本质。）她去了阿维姆 SK-51！我们以祖先的名义发誓！
Hmm, I believe you. You don’t seem stupid enough to continue lying to me. Biomancers, fetch a containment unit. Her contamination must not be allowed to spread any further.
嗯，我相信你。你应该不会傻到到现在了还继续骗我。生化师们，准备一个集装箱。不能让她再继续传播疫病了。

No, please! You cannot deny us open skies! Plague cannot be contained. You will succumb anyway… (A team of biomancers seals the Kir’Ko inside a hermetic case and proceeds towards the Biosecurity Engagement facility)
不，不要这样！你不能夺走我们在天空自由翱翔的权利！这场疫病是无法控制的。你们早晚也会受到感染…（一队生化师将这个奇尔寇关进一个密封的箱子里，朝着生化安全应对所方向去了）

Although killing that wretch would have destroyed the plague inside her, and might have been the more merciful option, we need more information about how this plague works in order to fight it better. Now to pursue Berhane to Avium SK-51. She won’t elude us a second time!
虽然杀掉那个可怜虫就能将她体内的寄生物一同摧毁，而且这对她也更仁慈，但我们需要得到关于这种疫病的更多信息，才能更好地对症下药。现在我们要去阿维姆 SK-51 捉拿勃海因。这次她逃不掉了！
Matron, while scouting the woods we heard a loud thundering sound. Now there is smoke rising in the distance.
族长，我们在探索森林的过程中听到了一声轰响，现在远处正在冒烟。
This could be the doing of my old mentor. We should investigate, but with caution!
这可能是我以前的导师干的。我们应当调查一下，但是一定要小心！
Your Huntresses spotted rising smoke in the distance. You must investigate this immediately - it might be your quarry's doing.
你的女猎手发现了远处在冒烟。你一定要立刻调查，很可能是你的猎物干的。
Sisters, please help! I’m stuck in my ship, and these Kir’Ko will cut me to ribbons!
姐妹们，快来帮我！我被卡在了飞船里，这些奇尔寇会将我切成碎片的！
(You see a crashed Amazon airship surrounded by an angry swarm of winged Kir’Ko.)[br/][br/]Quickly sisters, form a hunting party! We must intervene before those insects reach her.
（你发现了一艘坠落的亚马逊飞船，被一群愤怒的长了翅膀的奇尔寇包围。）[br/][br/]快啊，姐妹们，组成狩猎编队！我们一定要阻止这些虫子接近她。
Several airborne Kir'Ko have been hunting the Amazon who was calling for help. You should assist in dealing with them.
有数个飞行奇尔寇正在围捕那个呼救的亚马逊人。你应该出手相助。
Thank you for your help, Matriarch. Without you and your warriors, I would not have survived that encounter. I owe you my life and offer you my services. You are {STR_LeaderName}, are you not?
谢谢你的帮助，族长。如果没有你和你的战士们，我已经死在刚才的战斗中了。我的命是你给的，我愿为你效力。你是{STR_LeaderName}，不是么？
I am, though my training as a Matriarch is not yet completed. You should address me as Matron. We are here to hunt down Berhane and bring her to justice. Do you know of her?
是的，虽然我的族长训练还未结束，你可以叫我族长。我们是来这里追捕勃海因并将她绳之以法的。你认识她吗？
Yes, Matron, I do! I was on her research team. We were trying to find uses for the Xenoplague.
是的，族长，我认识她！我曾是她的研究团队成员。当时我们正在研究异星疫病的用途。
You served Berhane? Then how can I trust you? Give me a good reason why I should not just abandon you to your fate here…
你曾为勃海因工作？那我怎么能相信你？给我一个不把你留在这儿等死的理由吧…

I am no longer loyal to Berhane! Her methods were far too radical, and I turned away from her leadership. I am a capable warrior. I know much about Berhane and can help you understand the Xenoplague. I put myself at your mercy, Matron.
我已经不再为勃海因效忠了！她的手段太过激进，我已经拒绝臣服于她的领导。我是名有能力的战士。我非常了解勃海因，还可以帮助你进一步了解异星疫病。我祈求你能网开一面，族长。
Hmm, I suppose I don’t have a choice but to accept this risk. We do not have the luxury of ignoring any information on this plague. You may join us for now.
嗯，没有办法，我只能冒这个险了。我们不能放过有关这种疫病的任何信息。你暂时可以加入我们。

I am happy to be allowed to redeem myself. I will not let you down! As a first step, there is a research facility we should visit. It was the location of most of Berhane’s experimentation with the plague. We had to find a new location after some of the experiments overran the place…
很高兴能有一次将功补过的机会，我不会让你失望的！首先，我们要去一个研究所。勃海因的大部分疫病实验都是在那里做的。在研究所被一些试验对象占领后，我们不得不换到一个新地点…
It would be too risky to allow you to join us. I will not judge you for what Berhane unleashed on this planet, but you should leave before I change my mind.
我不能让你加入我们，风险太大了。我不会因为勃海因在这个星球上所做所为而怪罪你，不过你最好在我改变主意之前离开。
I respect your choice, Matron {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Good luck with hunting Berhane and fighting the plague. I am sorry to have had a hand in it…
我尊重你的选择，{STR_LeaderFirstName}族长。希望你能早日找到勃海因，战胜这场疫病。很抱歉我曾参与过这一切…
If you are to find out more about this Xenoplague then you have to search one of its research laboratories.
如果你想要找到更多关于异星疫病的信息，就必须搜查其中一个疫病实验室。
What were those creatures? They did not look like infected animals or people…
这些生物是什么东西？它们看起来不像是受感染的动物或者是人…

They were neither. When given enough time and sustenance, the plague parasite can grow and strengthen, becoming a sentient creature with its own mobility. Their sentience is, of course, limited: their main purpose is to spread the Xenoplague that created them.
它们不是动物和人。有了足够时间和营养补给，疫病寄生物就可以生长变强，成为一种可以自行移动的知觉生物。当然它们的感官是有限的，主要目的还是传播塑造了它们的异星疫病。
They looked more like monsters, but they had distinguishing characteristics similar to the Xenoplague parasite we investigated earlier.
它们看起来更像是怪物，但它们有着鲜明的特征，和我们先前调查的异星疫病寄生物很相似。

We should gather as much material from their bodies as we can to aid our research back at the colony. Make haste, sisters. I dare not remain here too long, in case more of these abominations roam the area.
我们需要从它们身体上收集足够多的材料才能帮助殖民地的疫病研究。动作快点，姐妹们。我不想在这里停留太久，要是出现更多这样的异形怪物就糟了。
You have collected plenty of sources on the plague from the Xeno Facilities. The next step would be to investigate further and see how this plague exactly works.
你已经在异星疫病研究所收集了很多关于资料。接下来就是进一步调查疫病，查明它的机制。
It is interesting how this Xenoplague works in conjunction with its host to sustain and enhance both organisms. I am beginning to understand why Berhane indulged this research.
异星疫病能与宿主共生，同时还能维持并强化自己和宿主的身体机能，这点非常有趣。我开始明白为什么勃海因会如此热衷于这个研究了。

All I’ve seen of the plague forces me to conclude that the only way to stop its spread is to burn the entire planet. There is an alternative option though. What if you could find a way to control it yourself, perhaps to use it? In the right hands, it would be a powerful weapon!
就我至今对这种疫病的了解，我能想到阻止它蔓延的唯一方法便是焚毁整个星球。不过还有另一种选择。倘若你自己能找到一种方法控制它，甚至利用它？如果使用得当，它必将是一种强大的武器！
You may be correct, but would I not then follow in Berhane’s footsteps?
也许你是对的，但那不就是重蹈勃海因的覆辙了么？
Berhane uses it for heinous reasons. If you were to adopt the Xenoplague yourself, you could right her wrongs and show that, in the right hands, it can be used for good.
勃海因把它用于令人不齿的目的。如果你能接纳异星疫病，你便可以纠正她的错误，并且也向能大家证明只要使用得当，异星疫病也可以造福万物。
You make a good point, Creusa. But I don’t know if we would even be able to contain such a vicious plague. Berhane could not control it, why would I fare any better?
你说的很有道理，克瑞乌萨。但我不知道我们能否控制住如此可怕的疫病。勃海因都没有办法控制它，我又如何能做得更好？
It is interesting how this Xenoplague works in conjunction with its host to sustain and enhance both organisms. I am beginning to understand why Berhane indulged in this research.
异星疫病能与宿主共生，同时还能维持并强化自己和宿主的身体机能，这点非常有趣。我开始明白为什么勃海因会如此热衷于这个研究了。

(You take a closer look at some of the sample vials containing small concentrations of the Alpha Strain. Some of the more developed parasites are throwing themselves against the walls of their glass prisons in an attempt to escape.)
（你仔细地查看几个标本瓶，那几个标本瓶内是初始毒株的小部分浓缩液。一部分发育得较好的寄生物正不断撞击着这个囚禁它们的玻璃监狱，企图从中逃离。）

What if the only way of defeating this plague is to bring it under our direct control? We could certainly use such a powerful weapon against Berhane. But I don’t know if we would even be able to contain such a vicious plague. Berhane could not control it, why would I fare any better?
战胜这种疫病的唯一方法会不会就是通过我们来直接控制它呢？这样强大的武器显然可以帮助我们对抗勃海因。但我不知道我们能否控制住如此可怕的疫病。勃海因都没有办法控制它，我又如何能做得更好？
With some reluctance, I have decided that it would be best to employ this technology ourselves, if only to better understand and thus fight it. I hope I will not come to later regret this decision.
虽然不太情愿，我还是决定我们最好亲自使用这种技术，至少也能更好地了解它然后对抗它。希望我以后不会为这个决定而后悔。

I will not allow myself to follow Berhane’s path – I have decided to ignore this technology and destroy the plague wherever I find it. I may be making the wrong call, but at least my conscience is clean.
我能让自己走上勃海因的老路。我决定不采用这种科技，并把我遇到的这种疫病全部摧毁。我也许是做了一个错误的决定，但至少我对得起良心。
More bloody Amazons?! Filthy plague-spreaders! Is it not enough that you mind-control your beasts? Must you also decide the fate of honorable men?
该死的亚马逊人越来越多了？！肮脏的疫病传播者！能够心灵控制野兽还不够么？你们还一定要主宰可敬的男人们的命运么？

Men? You are male humans? Apologies for intruding, we are not plague-spreaders and are not associated with any Amazons you met before. We are here to track them down to put an end to their corruption.
男人？你们是男性人类？很抱歉我们突然造访，我们不是疫病传播者，与你们之前遇见的亚马逊人也没有任何关系。我们前来抓捕她们，彻底阻止她们的恶行。

Even so, I’d appreciate it if you did not approach our position any further. We settled here in an attempt to avoid conflict, but only found more of it. This plague is disgusting… it infected some of my troopers and steered them off into the wilderness. What proof do you have that you are not here to do the same to the rest of us? It’s best if you just leave. I want no more war today…
尽管如此，我还是希望你们不要再继续靠近我们的据点了。我们在这里定居只是为了避免纷争，但总是事与愿违。这场疫病令人恶心…我的一些士兵被感染之后逃到森林里去了。你有什么证据可以证明你们不是来对我们这些剩下的人下同样的毒手？你们最好还是离开吧，我今天不想再参与更多的战争了…

We could use an ally on this planet. Perhaps they would consider helping us if we do something for them. They may appreciate if we put down the plague-ridden troops they mentioned to prevent them from causing any more havoc.
在这个星球上，我们需要他们的合作。也许我们帮他们做点什么，他们就会考虑提供帮助。如果我们消灭他们之前提到的那些受感染的士兵，防止那些士兵再生事端，或许就能博得他们的好感。
Frank Vance was torn about some of his troops falling victim to the vicious Xenoplague. Perhaps you should end their suffering to ease his sorrow.
弗兰克·万斯因为他的部下感染了可怕的异星疫病而十分痛心。也许你该让这些人得到解脱，这样他才能好受点。
Now these warriors can rest instead of being parasite puppets.
现在这些战士们可以安息了，他们终于摆脱这些寄生物的控制。

I cannot thank you enough for what you have done. Sadly, I don’t think I can assist you in finding the Amazon responsible for all this. All I know is that she infected that crazy Kir’Ko and her colony with the plague, and they’ve been tearing the area apart.
你的善举我无以为报。但很抱歉，我认为我无法帮你找到那些散播疫病的亚马逊人。我所知道的就是她用疫病感染了那个疯子奇尔寇和她的殖民地，那些奇尔寇正在那片区域疯狂肆虐。
It was our honor to help ease your pain of loss. Thank you for the information. We will try to retrace Berhane’s steps.
很荣幸能够帮你缓解忧虑。谢谢你告诉我们这些。我们会尝试追踪渤海因的脚步。

Hang on, before you go: some of my troopers insist on being allowed to help you during your search. I can’t stop them, so they are at your disposal until this horrible situation is resolved. Good luck out there.
等等，在你们离开之前我有话想说：我的一些部下强烈要求我允许他们帮助你们抓捕勃海因。我不能阻止他们，所以他们就交给你差遣了，直到你们解决这个大麻烦。祝你们好运。
We are grateful for their assistance in our struggle, Frank Vance. May peace find you.
我们非常感激他们在这个时候伸出援手，弗兰克·万斯。希望你能获得安宁。
I have come to the conclusion that I still have one more fight left inside me before I completely retire. Let us join you in your war against Berhane's minion! Show me where the fight is!
我意识到我的内心其实还想在彻底退休之前再战一次。让我们加入你，共同对抗勃海因的杂碎们！快告诉我战场在哪里吧！
To think I would be able to escape from conflict was foolish. Well, let’s get this over with.
以为我会逃避战斗就太愚蠢了。好吧，赶紧把这事了结了。
Did I deserve this fate? At least I will be able to join my comrades in death…
这样做值得么？至少我可以去黄泉路上陪伴我的战友们了…
Creusa may have been misguided before, but I believe that her heart was pure. We should give her an appropriate burial so that she may rejoin Mother Nature.
克瑞乌萨之前曾误入歧途，但是我相信她的内心是纯粹的。我们应该给她一场体面的葬礼，让她重回自然母亲的怀抱。
You can win this map by stopping Berhane's lackey and discovering where your old mentor went after leaving Thanakiwa.[br/][br/]Infected Kir'Ko Stopped: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
阻止勃海因的走狗，找出你以前的导师离开瑟纳基瓦之后的行踪即可获得这张地图的胜利。[br/][br/]阻止感染的奇尔寇：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
